content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used an AI command to browse the website 'https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/' and asked "What are the best trails to explore in the Brno Reservoir area?" My computer returned an answer from the website which provided information on running trails in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. The article maps out approximately 8 km of suitable running in the reservoir area, which includes rolling hills. Additionally, there are options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, such as exploring quiet, low trafficked roads or running on the trails of the Junák hiking area. The article also provides information on bus access and includes a route map for the waterfront sections.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://littleholidays.net/blog/brno-czech-republic-where-to-stay/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g274714-d6701144-Reviews-Brno_Dam-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html", "https://www.trip.com/travel-guide/attraction/brno/brno-dam-58316975/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/AttractionsNear-g274714-d4381314-Brno_Kralovo_Pole_Station-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html"]', type='action_result')]
"""
